title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, brown ground beef over medium-high heat.
Add onion and garlic, and saut√© until onion is translucent.
Stir in diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti, and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
